data.title: Catherine Mc Auley High School With Reviews, Requirements 2024
data.meta_description: Latest updates of Catherine Mc Auley High School about 2024 reviews, tuition, requirements, rankings. Accompanied by realistic 360 virtual tour & lots of valuable information.
data.text:
Catherine McAuley High School knows young women!

McAuley is a small, all-girls' Catholic school in the East Flatbush section of Brooklyn, New York, not far from Brooklyn College. Young women need the opportunity for quality education more than ever. They need a safe environment in which they can learn and grow. Catherine McAuley High School has provided these opportunities for the young women of Brooklyn since 1942. Students, faculty, parents, guardians, and administration make up "The McAuley Family." Together, we create an atmosphere that meets the needs of today's young women, and prepares them to be the leaders of tomorrow.

Catherine McAuley High School is dedicated to preparing young Christian women for life. Our goal is to transform you into an educated, independent Christian woman.

"Preparing Women, Producing Leaders: Education for Life!"
